title: The Mask of Cthulhu
description: "In his house at R'lyeh, dead Cthulhu waits dreaming..." In these stories, six luckless humans feel the power of the dread Old One, Cthulhu, and plumb the depths of primordial horror in strange adventures in this world and more terrible dimensions...August Derleth, H.P. Lovecraft's long-time friend and collaborator, has used Lovecraft's themes, characters and settings to create these new stories in a great tradition.The Arkham Edition of H.P. Lovecraft brings you works by Lovecraft himself—many new to paperback—and tales by inheritors of the Lovecraft tradition such as August Derleth, Robert Bloch, and Colin Wilson.Contents:Introduction.The Return of Hastur.The Whipporwills in the Hills.Something in Wood.The Sandwin Compact.The House in the Valley.The Seal of R'lyeh.
author: August Derleth
